miniDetailPage.empty: No Data Available For This Mini

pendingAlert.title: Pending Approval
pendingAlert.text: This model is pending approval. If there aren't any tags below, try adding some. If there are, give it a few days, we only approve a few a day.

rejectedAlert.title: Rejected
rejectedAlert.text: This model was rejected. There's a few reasons we reject minis, normally because there's a duplicate or it's not made for tabletop gaming. If you think this is a mistake, get in touch on Reddit, Discord, or email using the "Feedback" buttons above.
